basics.name: Jonathan Mahrt Guyou
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience in full-stack development, mobile applications, and entrepreneurship.

work.summary: Led development of Swift-based iOS games
highlights: Led development of Swift-based iOS games, gaining expertise in mobile game architecture and UIKit animations
Designed CoreData persistence layer enabling offline gameplay and seamless user progress syncing
Implemented custom SpriteKit physics and particle systems, enhancing visual quality while maintaining 60 FPS

work.summary: Built a full-stack website with React JS frontend and Firebase backend
highlights: Built a full-stack website with React JS frontend and Firebase backend to streamline user interactions
Resolved 500+ technical issues for users, increasing user satisfaction scores by 25% and site reliability by 40%
Boosted user interaction 40% with a custom system that streamlined communication, sign-ups, and updates
Developed and maintained Teamwyrk's website, enhancing user experience and system performance
Built a Firebase backend managing data for 1000+ users and designed intuitive UI with React JS
Implemented responsive design and cross-browser compatibility, reducing bounce rates by 35%

work.summary: Led development of a university-matching app with automated features
highlights: Led development of a university-matching app with automated features, helping 1000+ students find schools
Built proprietary matching algorithm, integrated PayPal API, and implemented automated customer service
Conducted market research with counselors, admissions officers, parents, and students to refine product fit
Placed top 3 in 2 entrepreneurship contests, earning funding and recognition for innovation and business potential
